answers.answer: Hello,This burning sensation can be due to parasthesia skin and not a dermatology issue. They are common in alcoholics and metabolic disorders like diabetes, hypothyroidism, and hypoparathyroidism. They can also be due to peripheral vascular disease, vitamin B12 deficiency or malnutrition.Get your blood sugar and thyroid hormones levels evaluated. You can take some vit B12 for some days and see if the burning is gone or not.In case the symptoms persist then please consult a neurologist as it can be due to some neurological disorder.It is very difficult to precisely confirm a diagnosis without examination and investigations and the answer is based on the medical information provided. For exact diagnosis, you are requested to consult your doctor. I sincerely hope that helps. Take care and please do keep me posted on how you are doing.
This happened after the sexual encounter.  And I also get transference in that if i touch my genitals then touch my eyes or nose i feel the burning there.
damn man, that sounds horrible. Could it be an allergy to the condom you used? or lube? Did you confront the person you engaged with. Maybe they have some answers....
No the girl is unavailable.  -  I think it is a type of bacteria because clotrimazole seems to make it better but just for a while.  Really constant washing and cream keeps it at bay
OK it turned out to be all in my head.  So be aware of the power of Psychosomatic effects

question: I had protected sex about 3 months ago and since the incident I have had burning on my peinus and anus.   The weird thing is that if I touch my face or eyes after touching my genital area I feel the same burning on the face - Think of when you touch a hot chili then touch your nose or eye’s.  There are no visual symptoms.  I have had all std tests and came back negative.  I have seen a urologist and a dermatologist.  Both have not been able to diagnose this.I have been working my way through a bunch of creams from the Dermatologist but nothing.  I think this is a new undiscovered STD.This discussion is related to/posts/show/294223.
title: Burning  on genitals like Menthol
